languages.text: Гемункул Тервантьяс утратил интерес к прежним занятиям и жаждет как можно скорее завершить некий "шедевр". Нет сомнений, что это зловещее и полное скверны творение принесет великие беды Человечеству, потому важно как можно скорее отыскать изделие гемункула и уничтожить.

The Haemonculus Tervantias has lost all interest in his former work and become obsessed with completing some unknown "masterpiece" as swiftly as possible. There is no doubt that this sinister and corrupted creation will bring great woe to Humanity, and so it is imperative that the Haemonculus's handiwork is found and destroyed without delay.
languages.original_text: Гемункул Тервантьяс утратил интерес к прежним занятиям и жаждет как можно скорее завершить некий "шедевр". Нет сомнений, что это зловещее и полное скверны творение принесет великие беды Человечеству, потому важно как можно скорее отыскать изделие гемункула и уничтожить.

traits.locale_text: The Haemonculus Tervantias has lost all interest in his former work and become obsessed with completing some unknown "masterpiece" as swiftly as possible. There is no doubt that this sinister and corrupted creation will bring great woe to Humanity, and so it is imperative that the Haemonculus's handiwork is found and destroyed without delay.

The Haemonculus Tervantias has lost all interest in his former work and become obsessed with completing some unknown "masterpiece" as swiftly as possible. There is no doubt that this sinister and corrupted creation will bring great woe to Humanity, and so it is imperative that the Haemonculus's handiwork is found and destroyed without delay.

There is no doubt that this sinister and corrupted creation will bring great woe to Humanity, and so it is imperative that the Haemonculus's handiwork is found and destroyed without delay.

The Haemonculus Tervantias has lost all interest in his former work and become obsessed with completing some unknown "masterpiece" as swiftly as possible. There is no doubt that this sinister and corrupted creation will bring great woe to Humanity, and so it is imperative that the Haemonculus's handiwork is found and destroyed without delay.

The Haemonculus Tervantias has lost all interest in his former work and become obsessed with completing some unknown "masterpiece" as swiftly as possible. There is no doubt that this sinister and corrupted creation will bring great woe to Humanity, and so it is imperative that the Haemonculus's handiwork is found and destroyed without delay.

languages.text: ハモンキュラス・テルヴァンティアスはこれまでの仕事への関心をすべて失い、謎の「傑作」を可及的速やかに完成させることに執着している。この不吉かつ不浄な創造物は、人類へと大きな災厄をもたらすのは間違いないだろう。ゆえに、ハモンキュラスの創造物を見つけ出し、遅滞なく破壊せねばならない。
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus Tervantias has lost all interest in his former work and become obsessed with completing some unknown "masterpiece" as swiftly as possible. There is no doubt that this sinister and corrupted creation will bring great woe to Humanity, and so it is imperative that the Haemonculus's handiwork is found and destroyed without delay.

traits.locale_text: ハモンキュラス・テルヴァンティアスはこれまでの仕事への関心をすべて失い、謎の「傑作」を可及的速やかに完成させることに執着している。この不吉かつ不浄な創造物は、人類へと大きな災厄をもたらすのは間違いないだろう。ゆえに、ハモンキュラスの創造物を見つけ出し、遅滞なく破壊せねばならない。

languages.text: 血伶人特万提亚斯对之前的工作彻底失去了兴趣，痴迷于完成某件未知的“杰作”。毫无疑问，这件邪恶与腐化的造物必将为人类带来巨大的灾难。行商浪人必须找到血伶人的“杰作”，将其彻底摧毁。
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus Tervantias has lost all interest in his former work and become obsessed with completing some unknown "masterpiece" as swiftly as possible. There is no doubt that this sinister and corrupted creation will bring great woe to Humanity, and so it is imperative that the Haemonculus's handiwork is found and destroyed without delay.

traits.locale_text: 血伶人特万提亚斯对之前的工作彻底失去了兴趣，痴迷于完成某件未知的“杰作”。毫无疑问，这件邪恶与腐化的造物必将为人类带来巨大的灾难。行商浪人必须找到血伶人的“杰作”，将其彻底摧毁。

languages.text: L'hémoncule Tervantias a perdu tout intérêt pour son œuvre précédente et a pour seule obsession de terminer un « chef-d'œuvre » inconnu aussi rapidement que possible. Il ne fait aucun doute que cette sinistre création corrompue est synonyme de malheur pour l'humanité. Il est donc impératif que le travail de l'hémoncule soit trouvé et détruit sans plus attendre.
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus Tervantias has lost all interest in his former work and become obsessed with completing some unknown "masterpiece" as swiftly as possible. There is no doubt that this sinister and corrupted creation will bring great woe to Humanity, and so it is imperative that the Haemonculus's handiwork is found and destroyed without delay.

traits.locale_text: L'hémoncule Tervantias a perdu tout intérêt pour son œuvre précédente et a pour seule obsession de terminer un « chef-d'œuvre » inconnu aussi rapidement que possible. Il ne fait aucun doute que cette sinistre création corrompue est synonyme de malheur pour l'Humanité. Il est donc impératif que le travail de l'hémoncule soit trouvé et détruit sans plus attendre.

languages.text: El Hemónculo Tervantias ha perdido todo interés por su anterior labor y se ha obsesionado con completar una misteriosa «obra maestra» lo antes posible. No cabe duda de que su siniestra y corrupta creación traerá un gran pesar a la Humanidad, por lo que hay que encontrar y destruir la creación del Hemónculo cuanto antes.
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus Tervantias has lost all interest in his former work and become obsessed with completing some unknown "masterpiece" as swiftly as possible. There is no doubt that this sinister and corrupted creation will bring great woe to Humanity, and so it is imperative that the Haemonculus's handiwork is found and destroyed without delay.

traits.locale_text: El Hemónculo Tervantias ha perdido todo interés por su anterior labor y se ha obsesionado con completar una misteriosa «obra maestra» lo antes posible. No cabe duda de que su siniestra y corrupta creación traerá un gran pesar a la Humanidad, por lo que hay que encontrar y destruir la creación del Hemónculo cuanto antes.

languages.text: Der Haemonculus Tervantias hat das Interesse an seiner einstigen Arbeit verloren und ist davon besessen, irgendein unbekanntes 'Meisterstück' schnellstmöglich zu vollenden. Es besteht kein Zweifel, dass diese dunkle und verderbte Kreation großes Leid über die Menschheit bringen wird. Das Machwerk des Haemonculus muss also gefunden und umgehend zerstört werden.
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus Tervantias has lost all interest in his former work and become obsessed with completing some unknown "masterpiece" as swiftly as possible. There is no doubt that this sinister and corrupted creation will bring great woe to Humanity, and so it is imperative that the Haemonculus's handiwork is found and destroyed without delay.

traits.locale_text: Der Haemonculus Tervantias hat das Interesse an seiner einstigen Arbeit verloren und ist davon besessen, irgendein unbekanntes 'Meisterstück' schnellstmöglich zu vollenden. Es besteht kein Zweifel, dass diese dunkle und verderbte Kreation großes Leid über die Menschheit bringen wird. Das Machwerk des Haemonculus muss also gefunden und umgehend zerstört werden.

languages.text: Haimonkulus Tervantias, eski çalışmasına dair tüm ilgisini yitirince "başyapıt" olarak bahsettiği, ne olduğu bilinmeyen bir projeyi mümkün olduğunca hızlı bir şekilde tamamlamayı takıntı hâline getirdi. Bu yozlaşmış ve uğursuz yaratımın, İnsanlığın başına büyük dertler açacağı kesin. Dolayısıyla Haimonkulus'un üzerinde çalıştığı şeyin bulunması ve derhâl yok edilmesi şart.
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus Tervantias has lost all interest in his former work and become obsessed with completing some unknown "masterpiece" as swiftly as possible. There is no doubt that this sinister and corrupted creation will bring great woe to Humanity, and so it is imperative that the Haemonculus's handiwork is found and destroyed without delay.
